hero.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subheadline: Find answers to common questions about our services, pricing, and how we work with clients.

faqs.question: What platforms do you support?
faqs.answer: We specialize in Amazon and Etsy marketplace consulting. Whether you're selling on one platform or both, we can help optimize your presence and grow your sales.

faqs.question: How does the consultation process work?
faqs.answer: We start with a free discovery call to understand your business and goals. From there, we create a custom strategy tailored to your specific needs and provide ongoing support throughout implementation.

faqs.question: How long before I see results?
faqs.answer: Results vary depending on your starting point and goals, but most clients see measurable improvements within 30-60 days. We focus on sustainable growth, not quick fixes.

faqs.question: Can you help with Amazon PPC advertising?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our Amazon advertising services include campaign setup, keyword research, bid optimization, and ongoing performance monitoring to maximize your ROI.

faqs.question: Do you help with Amazon account suspensions?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We have experience helping sellers navigate account health issues, including suspension appeals and compliance guidance to prevent future problems.

faqs.question: How can you improve my Etsy SEO?
faqs.answer: We optimize your shop and listings for Etsy's search algorithm, including title optimization, tag research, category selection, and attribute usage to improve visibility.

faqs.question: Do you offer Etsy shop setup assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we help new sellers set up their Etsy shops properly from the start, including shop branding, policy creation, and listing optimization best practices.

faqs.question: Are there any hidden fees?
faqs.answer: No hidden fees, ever. We believe in transparent pricing. What you see on our pricing page is what you pay. We'll always discuss any costs upfront before starting work.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds or guarantees?
faqs.answer: We stand behind our work. While marketplace success depends on many factors, we offer a satisfaction guarantee on our consulting services. If you're not happy with our recommendations, we'll work with you to make it right.

faqs.question: Is there a discount for using both Amazon and Etsy services?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer a bundle discount for clients who use our services for both platforms. Check our pricing page for details on our multi-platform packages.
